{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Manager - Logistics",
  "description": "Swift Consulting - We are experts in our fields of work, we use the most modern systems and up-to date knowledge to provide support in all fields particularly in Human Resources, Accounting and Finance, Facility Management, Health Maintenance, Education and Business Management. Our team consists of experts in different professions with a wealth of experience in different sectors both within and outside Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Manager - Logistics

Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos

Responsibilities


	Manage logistics operations to ensure timely and efficient vehicle movement and delivery.
	Monitor fleet performance, utilization, and maintenance.
	Ensure compliance with regulatory, safety, and operational standards.
	Develop strategies to optimize routes, reduce costs, and enhance service delivery.
	Foster strong relationships with clients, vendors, and transport partners.
	Lead, train, and coordinate logistics staff.
	Prepare and analyze logistics reports, budgets, and performance metrics.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Business Administration, Logistics, Supply Chain Management, or a related field.
	Minimum of 5 years of experience in logistics management (automotive, transport, or fleet operations preferred).
	Strong leadership, communication, and decision-making skills.
	Proven expertise in fleet coordination, route planning, and operational management.
	Excellent organizational, analytical, and problem-solving abilities.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;hireme@swiftconsulting.com.ng&nbsp;using &ldquo;Manager &ndash; Logistics&rdquo; as the subject of the mail.",
  "datePosted": "2025-11-24",
  "validThrough": "2025-12-09",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Swift Consulting"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",
       "addressRegion": ". ",
       "streetAddress": ". ",
      "addressLocality": "Lagos",
      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },
  "identifier": {
    "@type": "PropertyValue",
    "name": "",
    "value": "190823"
  },
  "baseSalary": {
    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",

      "@type": "QuantitativeValue",
      "minValue": 0,

    }
  }
}



Manager - Logistics Job at Swift Consulting




        
    

        
        Swift Consulting - We are experts in our fields of work, we use the most modern systems and up-to date knowledge to provide support in all fields particularly in Human Resources, Accounting and Finance, Facility Management, Health Maintenance, Education and Business Management. Our team consists of experts in different professions with a wealth of experience in different sectors both within and outside Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Manager - Logistics

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos

Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Manage logistics operations to ensure timely and efficient vehicle movement and delivery.
	Monitor fleet performance, utilization, and maintenance.
	Ensure compliance with regulatory, safety, and operational standards.
	Develop strategies to optimize routes, reduce costs, and enhance service delivery.
	Foster strong relationships with clients, vendors, and transport partners.
	Lead, train, and coordinate logistics staff.
	Prepare and analyze logistics reports, budgets, and performance metrics.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration, Logistics, Supply Chain Management, or a related field.
	Minimum of 5 years of experience in logistics management (automotive, transport, or fleet operations preferred).
	Strong leadership, communication, and decision-making skills.
	Proven expertise in fleet coordination, route planning, and operational management.
	Excellent organizational, analytical, and problem-solving abilities.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hireme@swiftconsulting.com.ng using “Manager – Logistics” as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     




        
        

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Factory Assistant (Skincare)",
  "description": "Swift Consulting Limited - Our client, a Skincare firm, is&nbsp;recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Factory Assistant (Skincare)
Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos

Responsibilities


	Support quality control checks during production.
	Assist in the production of skincare products (mixing, filling, packaging, labelling).
	Operate basic factory equipment under supervision.
	Ensure cleanliness and hygiene in the production area.
	Arrange and organize raw materials and finished goods.
	Follow standard operating procedures (SOPs) for skincare production.
	Report equipment faults or shortages to the supervisor.


Requirements


	Minimum of SSCE, OND, or equivalent qualification.
	Previous experience in a skincare or cosmetics factory is an added advantage.
	Good hygiene and neatness.
	Physical fitness for standing, lifting, and performing manual tasks.
	Ability to follow instructions and pay attention to detail.
	Willingness to learn and work in a fast-paced environment.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;hireme@swiftconsulting.com.ng&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

Factory Assistant (Skincare) Job at Swift Consulting Limited




        
    

        
        Swift Consulting Limited - Our client, a Skincare firm, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Factory Assistant (Skincare)
Job Location: Lagos

Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Support quality control checks during production.
	Assist in the production of skincare products (mixing, filling, packaging, labelling).
	Operate basic factory equipment under supervision.
	Ensure cleanliness and hygiene in the production area.
	Arrange and organize raw materials and finished goods.
	Follow standard operating procedures (SOPs) for skincare production.
	Report equipment faults or shortages to the supervisor.


Requirements


	Minimum of SSCE, OND, or equivalent qualification.
	Previous experience in a skincare or cosmetics factory is an added advantage.
	Good hygiene and neatness.
	Physical fitness for standing, lifting, and performing manual tasks.
	Ability to follow instructions and pay attention to detail.
	Willingness to learn and work in a fast-paced environment.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hireme@swiftconsulting.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Human Resources Assistant",
  "description": "Bluetti is a global leader in clean energy technology, dedicated to delivering reliable and innovative solar power solutions to homes, businesses, and off-grid communities. With operations in over 110 countries and a growing presence in Nigeria, we specialize in portable power stations, solar generators, and modular energy storage systems that are reshaping how people access and use electricity.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Human Resources Assistant

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos

Job Overview


	The Human Resources Assistant will assist in HR duties within Bluetti Energy Nigeria Limited, supporting recruitment, employee relations, HR policies, and general people operations to ensure smooth HR processes and a positive workplace experience.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field.
	Minimum of 2 years of proven experience in HR or people operations.
	Strong knowledge of HR policies, recruitment, and employee relations.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;linda@bluetti.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

  "validThrough": "2025-12-25",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",

    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "BLUETTI"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {

       "postalCode": ". ",

Human Resources Assistant Job at Bluetti




        
    

        
        Bluetti is a global leader in clean energy technology, dedicated to delivering reliable and innovative solar power solutions to homes, businesses, and off-grid communities. With operations in over 110 countries and a growing presence in Nigeria, we specialize in portable power stations, solar generators, and modular energy storage systems that are reshaping how people access and use electricity.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Human Resources Assistant

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos

Job Overview
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Human Resources Assistant will assist in HR duties within Bluetti Energy Nigeria Limited, supporting recruitment, employee relations, HR policies, and general people operations to ensure smooth HR processes and a positive workplace experience.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field.
	Minimum of 2 years of proven experience in HR or people operations.
	Strong knowledge of HR policies, recruitment, and employee relations.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: linda@bluetti.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Backend Developer",
  "description": "Greenwood Limited - Our client is recruiting suitable candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Backend Developer

Job Location:&nbsp;Abuja (FCT)&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	Our Client is seeking an experienced Backend Developer to join our team, responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining scalable and secure backend systems that support our financial services platform.
	The ideal candidate will have a strong background in backend development, excellent problem-solving skills, and a passion for delivering high-quality software solutions.


Key Responsibilities


	Design and Develop Backend Systems: Design and develop scalable and secure backend systems that meet the needs of our financial services platform.
	Implement APIs and Microservices: Implement RESTful APIs and microservices that integrate with other systems and applications.
	Collaborate with Development Teams: Collaborate with development teams to ensure seamless integration of backend systems with frontend applications.
	Ensure Security and Compliance: Ensure that all backend systems and software solutions meet security and compliance requirements.
	Troubleshoot and Optimize: Troubleshoot and optimize backend systems to ensure high performance, scalability, and reliability.


Requirements


	Bachelor&#39;s Degree in Computer Science or Related Field: A degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field is required.
	Backend Development Experience: Proven experience in backend development, with a strong background in languages such as Java, Python, or C#.
	Database Experience: Experience with database management systems such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB.
	API Development: Experience with API development, including RESTful APIs and microservices.
	Excellent Problem-Solving Skills: Excellent problem-solving skills, with the ability to debug and troubleshoot complex issues.


Nice to Have:


	Financial Services Experience: Experience working in the financial services industry, with knowledge of regulatory requirements and industry standards.
	Cloud Experience: Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS or Azure.
	Certifications: Relevant certifications such as Certified Java Developer or Certified AWS Developer.


What We Offer


	Competitive Salary: A competitive salary package with opportunities for growth and development.
	Opportunities for Growth: Opportunities for career growth and professional development in a dynamic and fast-paced environment.
	Collaborative Environment: A collaborative and dynamic work environment with a team of experienced professionals.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CVand portfolio to:&nbsp;greenwoodlimited@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: If you&#39;re a motivated and talented Backend Developer looking for a new challenge, we&#39;d love to hear from you!",

Backend Developer Job at Greenwood Limited




        
    

        
        Greenwood Limited - Our client is recruiting suitable candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Backend Developer

Job Location: Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	Our Client is seeking an experienced Backend Developer to join our team, responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining scalable and secure backend systems that support our financial services platform.
	The ideal candidate will have a strong background in backend development, excellent problem-solving skills, and a passion for delivering high-quality software solutions.


Key Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Design and Develop Backend Systems: Design and develop scalable and secure backend systems that meet the needs of our financial services platform.
	Implement APIs and Microservices: Implement RESTful APIs and microservices that integrate with other systems and applications.
	Collaborate with Development Teams: Collaborate with development teams to ensure seamless integration of backend systems with frontend applications.
	Ensure Security and Compliance: Ensure that all backend systems and software solutions meet security and compliance requirements.
	Troubleshoot and Optimize: Troubleshoot and optimize backend systems to ensure high performance, scalability, and reliability.


Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or Related Field: A degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field is required.
	Backend Development Experience: Proven experience in backend development, with a strong background in languages such as Java, Python, or C#.
	Database Experience: Experience with database management systems such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB.
	API Development: Experience with API development, including RESTful APIs and microservices.
	Excellent Problem-Solving Skills: Excellent problem-solving skills, with the ability to debug and troubleshoot complex issues.


Nice to Have:


	Financial Services Experience: Experience working in the financial services industry, with knowledge of regulatory requirements and industry standards.
	Cloud Experience: Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS or Azure.
	Certifications: Relevant certifications such as Certified Java Developer or Certified AWS Developer.


What We Offer


	Competitive Salary: A competitive salary package with opportunities for growth and development.
	Opportunities for Growth: Opportunities for career growth and professional development in a dynamic and fast-paced environment.
	Collaborative Environment: A collaborative and dynamic work environment with a team of experienced professionals.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CVand portfolio to: greenwoodlimited@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: If you're a motivated and talented Backend Developer looking for a new challenge, we'd love to hear from you!    

    

        Click here to Apply
